name: redux-ui-router
description: Redux middleware for use with Angular UI Router

scripts.test: npm run lint; NODE_ENV=test node node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register --recursive --require src/__tests__/index.js src/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:live: npm run lint; NODE_ENV=test node node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register --recursive --require src/__tests__/index.js -w src/**/*.test.js
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run test; node node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run bundle:dev && npm run bundle:prod

author: Neil Fenton (neilff)
